name: Ratatouille Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: When you want to be just like Julia – without all the time and effort – this is your new go-to for effortless entertaining. Based on the French Provençale dish, Ratatouille Seasoning is rich with herbs and garlic. All you need to do is chop up a few simple veggies (think peppers, eggplant, and zucchini), open a can of tomatoes, sauté until tender, and voilà, you’ve got a beautiful flavor bomb ready to go!
